name: Journey to the sky
description:
Have you ever dreamt flying freely in the sky? Just take your house and a few balloons and fly away from your town. Oh, and also, beware of the birds and of the dropping tennis balls. Starting your journey at dawn, you will explore a few landscapes before finally reaching the Niagara Falls at sunset!

Escape from the town !

Fly away !

Explore new worlds !

Reach your dream destination !
